] [Single Phantom Parameter] Reserve only has phantom P, not T. Can this allow a Reserve to handle multiple coin types incorrectly if functions don't validate coin_type field? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: market_value()] [Decimal Division Order] Divides mul(price, liquidity_amount) by pow(10, decimals). Can alternative orderings reduce precision loss or prevent overflow? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: compound_interest()] [APR Calculation Precision] Divides APR by seconds_in_year then uses pow. Can this lose precision compared to calculating (1 + APR)^(time/year)? (Medium)
